<h4 id="getalarmmetricmetricmetricconfig">Get<wbr>Alarm<wbr>Metric<wbr>Metric<wbr>Metric<wbr>Config</h4>



<div>
<pulumi-choosable type="language" values="csharp">
<dl class="resources-properties"><dt class="property-required"
